Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~Senthil1 Could you take a look at this one?

Action.author: senthil1
Action.body: For v1.0, we haven't updated MockStub implementation yet. MockStub implementation does not provide support for simulation of transaction, validation, and commit. Hence, every PutState() modifies the ledger.Â We need a new testing architecture which can directly use ledger interface. For now, it is better to dev mode for testing purpose. http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/peer-chaincode-devmode.html
